all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And remember in all things the poor and the needy, the sick and the afflicted, for he that doeth not these things, the same is not my disciple.
Doctrine and Covenants 52:40
Quote of the Day
"Our hope is our Savior, Jesus Christ. Through Him, all our righteous dreams will be realized."
Neil L. Andersen | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
